fields.message: Clear Your Cabinet: You are signed up for reminders of the next Prescription Drug Take Back Day. Reply STOP to cancel txt msgs.
Clear Your Cabinet: You are signed up for reminders of the next Prescription Drug Take Back Day. Reply STOP to cancel txt msgs.

Friend --

America’s opioid crisis is a national emergency. Thank you for taking an incredibly important step to address the crisis in New York.

The next National Prescription Drug Take Back Day is on April 28th from 10 AM to 2 PM. We will send you a reminder so you can find the locations closest to you and make a plan.

Clear Your Cabinet is an initiative of New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman.

Friend --

You have cancelled your subscription to Clear Your Cabinet! Drop-off your unused drugs anytime at your nearby pharmacy.
You have unsubscribed from email reminders for Clear Your Cabinet. Drop-off your unused drugs anytime at your nearby pharmacy.
Today is Prescription Drug Take Back Day from 10 AM to 2 PM. Find a drop-off site near you: clearyourcabinet.com Reply STOP to cancel txt msgs.

Friend --

Tomorrow is National Prescription Drug Take Back Day, and New Yorkers from across the state will be heading to drop-off sites near their homes or workplaces to safely dispose of unused medication.

Click here to find your nearest drop-off site.

Once you’ve found a nearby site, we recommend calling them before you head out, and confirming their availability and hours.

Thank you for clearing your cabinet. Together we can make a crucial difference in combatting the opioid crisis in New York State.

Clear Your Cabinet is an initiative of New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman.
